rdf:Description.dc:title: Business plan 2006
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Solicitor General and Public Security.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Plans cover three years and are prepared in accordance with the Government Accountability Act and the government's accounting policies.

Ministry includes the Department of Solicitor General and Public Security and the Victims of Crime Fund as entities for government reporting purposes, as well as the Law Enforcement Review Board, the Criminal Injuries Review Board and the Victims of Crime Program Committee.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Alberta. Alberta Solicitor General and Public Security
